snippet: The winners of the 83rd Goldman Pairs were Jared Lilienstein and Michael Polowan of New York City.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deals played during the Goldman Pairs at the Edgar Kaplan Winter Regional tournament in New York City.
lead_paragraph: The winners of the 83rd Goldman Pairs were Jared Lilienstein and Michael Polowan of New York City.
